messages.title: It's a two horse race here!
messages.content: Polling stations are open from 7am - 10pm. You don't need to have your polling card to vote. If you have a postal vote and have forgotten to send it in, you can still take it to the polling station. For a lift to the polling station call [PHONE NUMBER]

messages.title: After sixty-five years, they've got nothing new to offer...
messages.content: Tories intensify personal attacks on Nick Clegg. Desperate Labour in smear bid. Just the same old scare stories and the same old negative politics.

messages.title: This time we can do things differently
messages.content: Only the Lib Dems offer real change

keyPolicies.policyDescription: No tax on the first £10,000 you earn
Cut NHS admin to protect frontline services
Proper equipment for Britain's Armed Forces

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Tories intensify personal attacks on Nick Clegg. Desperate Labour in smear bid
mentions.partyLeader: Nick Clegg now in contention as potential PM
mentions.tacticalSituation: It's a two horse race here! Can't win here [Lab]. Lib Dem 44% Con 33% Lab 12% Others 11%. Ladbrokes make it evens on a Lib Dem win here.

issues.economy: No tax on the first £10,000 you earn
issues.governance: Proper equipment for Britain's Armed Forces
issues.health: Cut NHS admin to protect frontline services

quotes.text: Only the Lib Dems offer real change

images.caption: Images depicting candidate Sandy Walkington, Nick Clegg, and two opposing party candidates with emphasized negative messaging.
